head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LIPTZIN, WILLIAM H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LIPTZIN, WILLIAM H.

block.p: LIPTZIN-William H. Of Boca Raton, FL and North Bellemore, LI. Passed away August 10. Beloved husband of Raye and loving father of Howard (Kyle Johnson) and Nancy Borg (Howard). Cherished grandfather of Corey and Jamie Borg and Isaak Liptzin. Brother of Ruth Ivler (David). Funeral services will be held on Sunday, August 13 at 11:30AM at Gutterman's, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, Long Island, 516-921-5757.
